intro: Artanthe ampla, commonly known as the California poppy, is a flowering plant native to the western United States. It is characterized by its vibrant orange to red flowers and linear, grass-like leaves. The plant typically grows in well-drained soils and thrives in full sun. It is part of the Papaveraceae family, which includes other poppies. Artanthe ampla is an annual plant that blooms from spring to early summer.
